page.title: 03SESSAY & HUTTON SESSAY
page.content:
Sessay is a peaceful village surrounded by beautiful countryside with the Hambleton Hills and the famous White Horse of Kilburn in the background. It provides a relaxing holiday base for the motorist and is especially suitable for the cyclist or hiker as the land, being in the Vale of York, is flat with only a few small hills. Sessay is only a short distance away from many picturesque villages and market towns.
Accommodation is readily available in the vicinity. In Sessay itself there is a five-van caravan site, with a larger public site at Hutton Sessay. Public Houses, providing substantial bar meals, are found at Hutton Sessay and Dalton. There are children's playgrounds at both these inns.
